name: Bitechain
description:
Controls: arrows key or WASD (both, if you're weird enough).

Goal: catch the prey.

How do it:

You're visible when you move, you can try standing there and wait for a prey to get closer (like a spider) but your hunger will be faster (die starving). There's nearly no way to catch a prey by chasing it: avoid waste time in this.

What do you need to do is to poke a tree, let an hanging fruit fall down and bring somewhere to lure your preys.

Strategy:

You only need 10 preys to complete the game, but you're going to most fail even to reach the first prey (despite the abundance); since in the beginning there's plenty of preys, best strategy is to catch and place as much as fruits you can.

Give priority to fruits, if there's a prey nearby but no fruits around don't be afraid to move (even if you have to scare the prey away).
